channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Fatal Traffic Collision; INC#0276; 06:27AM; NB 405 Fwy x Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tbz9Z6; #VanNuys; PRELIM: Multi-vehicle collision with 4 patients total: One is deceased at scene. Three others with unspecified injuries, two of whom are anticipated to be transported by LAFD ambulance. No further details. #LATrafffic: Closure of one or more northbound lanes of the San Diego (I-405) Freeway at Sherman Way until CHP and Medical Examiner operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio. Media Inquiries: CHP West Valley (Log #410) and Medical Examiner.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; E39 E90 RA39 RA839; CH8; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0201; 05:10AM; 16930 W Tupper St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ro3aEH; Northridge; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 32 minutes with no injuries reported. The contents of the home indicate a marijuana grow operation and LAPD is on scene to handle the investigation. The fire extended into the attic and firefighters on the roof are conducting an extensive ventilation (strip) operation with an additional truck company enroute to assist. No further details.; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC15 E103 E275 E287 E290 E87 E90 RA87 RA903 T75 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0201; 04:38AM; 16930 W Tupper St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ro3aEH; Northridge; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC15 E103 E287 E290 E87 E90 RA87 RA903 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0943; 02:12PM; 8600 N Keokuk Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3taf8SN; Canoga Park; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 28 minutes with no injuries reported. No other structures were damaged. No further details.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC17 E103 E104 E107 E273 E296 RA104 RA96 T73 T93 T96; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0943; 01:44PM; 8600 N Keokuk Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3taf8SN; Canoga Park; One story, detached garage fully involved in fire. Firefighters are in the defensive mode while also defending any exposed structures. ; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC17 E103 E104 E107 E273 E296 RA104 RA96 T73 T93 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic ; INC#1288; 04:19PM; 11482 W Magnolia Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PqcLT6; outside city; Two car traffic collision with a total of four patients. Two patients were transported to the hospital (21yo F and 22yo M both in fair condition) and two patients declined LAFD transport. Any further questions are referred to LAFD Incident #3162. No further details.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC10 BC14 E260 E278 E60 E76 E86 E89 EM14 EM17 HR3 RA60 RA77 RA78 RA86 RA860 T60 T78 UR88; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

Small Plane Crash; INC#0817; 12:53PM; 401 W Westmont Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PuLS0v; Wilmington; A small plane crashed (into a soccer field) with two persons on board. The pilot was still in the plane upon LAFD arrival and extricated. Both patients were transported (age/gender unk) in *at least* critical condition. There was no fire and no other patients reported. ; FS 36; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 CM20 CM22 E112 E285 E36 E85 EM6 HR3 RA36 RA38 T85; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0954; 02:32PM; 645 N Gardner St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KCizHD; #Fairfax; Thirty LAFD firefighters responded to find a contents-only fire inside of a one-story single family home (site of previous burn). It took crews 12 minutes (2:44pm) to extinguish the flames, keeping it from spreading to the structure itself. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 E227 E261 E41 E52 E61 RA41 RA861 SO1 T27 T61; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0881; 01:38PM; 20800 Waveview Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EOFpZd; #PacificPalisades; LAFD responded to an approximately 21-year-old female, following a mountain bike crash on a remote trail near Trippet Ranch in Topanga State Park. Paramedics made contact with the patient via ground, while LAFD Air Ops landed nearby. Ground crews transferred her into the helicopter, which took off and transported her to an area hospital in moderate condition. Nothing further.; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 AO2 BC18 BP23 E23 E237 H1 H7 HA1 HA7 RA23 RH214 T37; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0604; 10:29AM; 17399 Sesnon Blvd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EOzeEv; #GranadaHills; LAFD responded to an approximately 25-year-old male hiker with a lower leg injury in a remote area near O'Melveny Park. Thank you to LACoFD Air Ops for responding in mutual aid assistance for the hoist and hospital transport of the patient (LAFD was responding to two other hikers and a brush incident at the time). Nothing further.; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E18 E275 H0A RA87 RH214 T75; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange
